resources.string:
Oh my meal native android application. For now this is OpenSource project. All recipes are from http://food2fork.com/. The author does not bear any responsibility resulting from use of the app. If you have additional question or suggestion, send me a email. Also food2fork API is not completely free.
If you like app, and want to support me, you can contact me via form in app or sending me a email.

App icons if from this guy https://www.iconfinder.com/webalys
